reviews.review: There are hackers, smurf accounts, boosters, glitches, bugs, and built on a real old engine, but there is just something about this game that will always draw you back wanting to play more. one of the most solid fps games.
You will have a love hate relationship with this game if you take the time to learn it
VERY ADDICTING, BUT NOT IN A GOOD WAY!
